name: Super WordUp
description:
Super WordUp, the fastest cross-word style game! We reward players who can think quick and move on to the next play. The game play itself is unique in its word building style. By building up words letter by letter, turn by turn, the player scores the highest bonuses. Also unique to this game; you can play larger words or multiple, smaller words per play with a bonus for using all of your letters. In addition, we also give players control over when they want to use the game's power-ups.

• Play a Big Word or Multiple, Smaller Words. Bonus Points for Using All of Your Letters!
• Play Fast for a Big Time Bonus!
• You Control the Power-Ups for Top Points.
• Multiple Language Support - English, English UK, Spanish, French.
• How “dense” are you? (That's a compliment.)
• iPhone and iPad support
